biotools.summary: Prokaryotic genome annotation framework that performs various intrinsic gene predictions, homology searches, predictions of non-coding genes, and complex features and integrates all evidence into a consensus annotation. It achieves high-quality and comprehensive annotations based on rules and priorities, similar to decision-making in manual curation. Parameters controlling the annotation process are configurable by the user.
